sentences.en: Britain has suffered from a poverty of ambition.
sentences.cn: 英国一直缺乏远大理想。

sentences.en: Bruce Rioch's driving ambition is the main reason behind their new-found success.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯·里奥克的勃勃雄心是他们新近成功的主要原因。

sentences.en: Have grandiose aims but puny abilities, great ambition but little talent.
sentences.cn: 眼高手低, 志大才疏.

sentences.en: He was young and full of ambition.
Her ambition to become an artist was thwarted by failing eyesight.
sentences.cn: 她想成为艺术家的梦想由于视力衰减而破灭了。

sentences.en: His ambition is to play the part of Dracula.
His ambition was to win gold at the Atlanta Games in 1996.
sentences.cn: 他的志向是在1996年亚特兰大奥运会上夺取金牌。

sentences.en: I had a burning ambition to become a journalist.
sentences.cn: 我热切期盼成为一名记者。

sentences.en: My ambition was to travel upwards in the ecclesiastical hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 我的雄心是在教会中一步一步往上走。

sentences.en: She never achieved her ambition of becoming a famous writer.
sentences.cn: 她一直未能实现当名作家的夙愿。

sentences.en: She showed her elation at having finally achieved her ambition.
sentences.cn: 最终实现了抱负,她显得十分高兴.

sentences.en: The young boy was burning with a fierce ambition.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人怀有极其远大的抱负。

sentences.en: They were not the only ones to have brains and ambition.
sentences.cn: 并不是只有他们聪明、有志向。

sentences.en: Vision and ambition are his great strengths.
sentences.cn: 目光远大、雄心勃勃是他的两大优点。

sentences.en: Women were not supposed to parade their ambition nakedly.
sentences.cn: 女性被认为不应该赤裸裸地展示其雄心。

sentences.en: You will achieve your ambition if you work hard.
sentences.cn: 如果你努力,你的抱负是可以实现的.

words.tran_cn: 野心勃勃的；有雄心的；热望的；炫耀的
雄心勃勃地；劲头十足地；热切地

trans.tran_en: determination to be successful, rich, powerful etc
